t: Amazon.com: A Way Forward: CDs & Vinyl
s: This band is really incredible. If you love 80s new wave then give these guys a listen. I'm a gen Xr who is reliving my childhood through this incredible music. I feel sheer unadulterated JOY listening to Nation Of Language. LOL Saw them live and I'm seriously hooked!

What a fantastic album from beginning to end. If you like OMD, New Order, Hot Chip, Future Islands, Broken Social Scene you will likely enjoy this breakout release by Nation of Language. I ordered the vinyl LP and it sounds amazing!

s: It's nice, thick black vinyl, with a nice inner sleeve. It even came in a nice thick clear plastic outer sleeve, vs the standard shrink wrap. ... Great album! Better than the previous one.
